duties_responsibilities.duty: Walking, feeding, and caring for animals on a daily basis.
Performing daily cleaning of kennels, cages, and public areas, following proper disease control protocol.
Stocking all kennel and cleaning supplies as needed.
Cleaning, folding, and stocking laundry throughout the clinic.
Minor facility maintenance and overall facility cleanliness.
Preparing in-house food recipes for hospitalized patients.
Assisting technicians and doctors in and out of appointments.
